snippet.title: Hexaquest, The Dice-builder RPG (Kickstarter & Demo Announcement Trailer)
snippet.description:
Our official launch date for our Kickstarter + free demo is Friday the 11th of October 2024 !!! (see below for exact times)

We've been working super hard to get this demo out for you folks so you can finally see the fuller version of our little dice game :)

It's about 3 hours long right now (which is a bit insane for a demo oops) and will include the entire first region of the game - The Domino Den!  Can't wait to share it with you all 🎲 💝

The exact time of release will be...
PDT: Thurs Oct 10 - 3pm
EDT: Thurs Oct 10 - 6pm
BST: Thurs Oct 10 - 11pm
CEST: Fri Oct 11 - 12am
UTC+8 (SE Asia/WA): Fri Oct 11 - 6am
AEDT: Fri Oct 11 - 9am
